name: Crash Mash Dash
description:
Crash Mash Dash is my interpretation of the combination of a match 3 game and a racing game. Crash into 3 racers of the same color to make a match. Eliminate everyone else to win!

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move, Space for boost

Tools Used: 

  • Unity (plus standard assets)
  • Visual Studio Community 2017 w/Resharper
  • Gimp 2.8

Known Bugs:

  • Enemy cars may sometimes get stuck
  • Enemy cars may sometimes spontaneously fly
